page.title: 13EDUCATION UNIFORM TIMETABLE
page.content: We have a school{uniform.}Girls wear a navy-blue skirt, a light blue blouse, a grey cardigan and black shoes (or brown). Boys wear black trousers but the other items are very similar. Our{timetable}is quite busy and includes Mathematics, English, Topic work, Science, Art, Craft and PE. This is a typical Monday: morning, 9.10 Registration and TV programme, 9.45{Ginn}(a reading scheme), 10.50 play, 11.05 Mental Arithmetic, 11.35 Handwriting, 12.10 lunch. For lunch we either bring sandwiches or have{school dinners} which cost about sixty pence. We can have, for example, chips, fish in batter, salad and puddings. After lunch we play until the bell rings. Afternoon, l.l5 Games lesson, 2.25 play, 2.40 story time, 3.10 silent reading, 3.50 time to go home.
